E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Progress of Larry Casian
Dear Sir,
Larry Casian has an ERA of 2.14 at AA Arkansas Travelers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/22/1990
Subject: Progress of Russ Springer
Dear Sir,
Russ Springer has nothing more to prove at A St. Petersburg Cardinals!
He has an ERA of 3.00 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
